snippet: An influential Iranian lawmaker said Sattar Beheshti, a blogger who died while in captivity, had not been tortured during interrogations, but called for further investigation.
abstract: Iranian lawmaker Alaeddin Borujerdi says Sattar Beheshti, blogger who died while in captivity, had not been tortured during interrogations; he does call for further investigation, rare instance in which Iran's Parliament and judiciary have followed up on human rights complaint that was first raised internationally.
lead_paragraph: An influential Iranian lawmaker said Sattar Beheshti, a blogger who died while in captivity, had not been tortured during interrogations, but called for further investigation.

headline.seo: Iran Says Sattar Beheshti Was Not Tortured Before Death
headline.main: Jailed Blogger Not Tortured Before Death, Iran Says
headline.print_headline: Jailed Blogger Not Tortured Before Death, Iran Says
